name: Visual Studio Work Item Query File
summary: Learn about .WIQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can create WIQ files for team projects using Visual Studio's Team Explorer by following these steps.
Right click the query and choose View Query.
Choose to save the query from the File menu.

description: File used by Visual Studio, a software development application developed by Microsoft; used by software development teams for storing work items such as bugs and tasks; helps with project management because it allows work items to be assigned, queued, and tracked.
